Manifest.Name: Microsoft System Center WS-Management Library MP

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Enumerate Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Enumerate.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Enumerate Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Enumerate.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Get Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Get.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Get Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Get.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Invoke Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Invoke.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: IWSManSession.Invoke Probe Action
DisplayString.Description: This module is the basic module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Invoke.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Library
DisplayString.Description: Microsoft System Center WS-Management Library MP: This Management Pack contains primarily module definitions that can be used to define discoveries/rules/tasks for using WS-Management APIs.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module Schemas
DisplayString.Description: This schema type contains simple and complex types used by most of the WS-Management modules defined in this library MP.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: Timed IWSManSession.Enumerate Discovery Data Data Source
DisplayString.Description: This module is a composite module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Enumerate invoked periodically and the WS-Management data output mapped to discovery data.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: Timed IWSManSession.Enumerate Data Source
DisplayString.Description: This module is a composite module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Enumerate invoked periodically.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: Timed IWSManSession.Get Data Source
DisplayString.Description: This module is a composite module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Get invoked periodically.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Module: Timed IWSManSession.Invoke Data Source
DisplayString.Description: This module is a composite module that provides the functionality of IWSManSession.Invoke invoked periodically.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management Action Account
DisplayString.Description: This account is used for WS-Management access.

DisplayString.Name: WS-Management data type
DisplayString.Description: This data type is outputted by most of the WS-Management modules defined in this library MP.
